text:
Here at Harken, we have created
the first ever truly healthy
candy bar.

A date caramel Snickers that I
created as a lifelong Snickers

obsessive, who had to give up
the stuff after a diagnosis
related to colon cancer.

It turned my life upside
down, and put gut health
at the forefront.

I created Harken to allow you to
harken back to nostalgic candy.

Our date super fruit
version brings with it

13 grams of prebiotic
fiber for your gut,

with only 150 calories, all
plant-based ingredients,
and 0 sugar added.

I will read a quote from the
acclaimed Taste Radio podcast.

"If you said that this was
a full sugar, full calorie

bar from Mars or Hershey,
I would not blink.
It's that good.

Harken is so close to the
original, some might say better,

it is a zero
sacrifice candy bar."

After two hard years
of development,

we hit shelves four months
ago, and people noticed.

So much so, that we caught
the eye of the world's biggest
retailer.

Yes, Walmart will
be welcoming us

onto the shelves of 3,600
stores in just 10 days.

These bars will
be in the checkout
aisle of 80% of Walmarts.

This makes Harken
the biggest new brand
launch they've ever done.

The best part is, we will be
on shelf right next to the gut

health destroying Snickers
and Reese's of yesteryear.

I started this brand to
change people's health

through the power
of food as medicine,

because as it turns
out, when it comes

to changing the standard
American diet, it's up to us

little guys to truly
make a difference.

Big food is certainly
not going to.

So I humbly ask for
your support as we

launch this movement that
tastes like yesterday,
but feels like the future.
